channel.title: Omotola Omotayo on Community Over Code Europe
channel.description: Recent content in Omotola Omotayo on Community Over Code Europe

item.title: Influencing the Tech Ecosystem through Community Participation.
item.description: Open source has widely grown to allow different tech career paths to enhance projects with their skills and provide jobs for those interested in working with open source. Open source contribution programs provide opportunities for interested individuals to become professionals. Outreachy is a paid and remote internship OS program that empowers, grows talents, and prepares them for career growth. Outreachy provides internships to people subject to systemic bias and impacted by underrepresentation in the technical industry where they are living.
